WHAT_IS_REALTYPLUS: RealtyPlus is an international real estate network operating across four continents. We offer franchise and master franchise opportunities supported by global branding, training, technology, and an international property portfolio.
COUNTRIES_OPERATING_IN: RealtyPlus currently operates in Europe, America, Asia, and the Middle East, with new openings in Lebanon and soon Egypt. Our network continues to grow every year.
FRANCHISE_INCLUSIONS: You receive full support: brand rights, training, technology tools, marketing materials, operational manuals, and access to the international property portfolio.
FRANCHISE_VS_MASTER: A franchise allows you to open and operate one RealtyPlus office. A master franchise gives you territorial rights to develop the brand in a full country or large region.
REAL_ESTATE_EXPERIENCE_REQ: Experience helps, but it’s not required. We train all our partners and guide them through every step. (Covers Q5 & Q25)
START_ALONE_OR_TEAM: You can start alone and grow progressively, or you can begin with a team. We adapt the model to your situation. (Covers Q6 & Q20)
ONBOARDING_LAUNCH_TIME: The onboarding process usually takes between 1–4 weeks depending on your availability and the model you choose. Many franchisees launch within 2–6 weeks. (Covers Q7 & Q24)
SUPPORT_RECEIVED: You receive ongoing support: International branding, Marketing materials, Sales and recruitment assistance, Technology training, Access to global listings, and Continuous coaching.
OPERATE_INTERNATIONALLY: Yes. RealtyPlus offers one of the strongest international connections in the real estate industry. You can work with clients locally and globally. (Covers Q9, Q26, & Q27)
STEPS_TO_GET_STARTED: The steps to get started are: 1. Initial conversation, 2. Receive full information, 3. Choose franchise or master, 4. Agreement signing, 5. Launch and training.
AREA_EXCLUSIVITY: Yes, this is possible depending on the country and the model selected.
MARKETING_ASSISTANCE: Absolutely. We offer marketing materials, campaigns, templates, tools, and international visibility.
RECRUITMENT_ASSISTANCE: Yes, we provide systems and processes for building your team.
TECHNOLOGY_TOOLS_OFFERED: Yes. RealtyPlus includes advanced digital tools to help manage your business, listings, leads, and international opportunities.
CONTACT_EXPANSION_TEAM: Yes, of course. I can schedule a call for you at your preferred time. (Covers Q15 & Q34)
WHERE_CAN_I_OPEN: You can open a franchise in your city or country, and we also offer master franchise options in countries where we are expanding.
WHY_CHOOSE_REALTYPLUS: Because we combine: Global presence, Personalized support, Real opportunities to grow internationally, A flexible model, and A strong brand with a proven record.
RECEIVE_DOCUMENTS_BROCHURE: Yes. I can send you the full franchise presentation and additional information.
TIME_DEDICATION_REQUIRED: It depends on whether you want to run the business full-time or part-time. We can adapt the model to both situations.
PHYSICAL_OFFICE_NEED: Not at the beginning. Many partners start online and later open a physical office as they grow.
TRAINING_FOR_TEAM: Yes, we offer continuous training for franchisees, managers, and agents.
EXPAND_TO_MULTIPLE_CITIES: Yes. If you want to operate in more than one city, you can consider the master franchise model.
VISIT_HEADQUARTERS: Yes, you are welcome to visit our central office or meet our international directors online.
GROW_BEYOND_SALES: Yes. Franchisees also work with rentals, investments, international buyers, and collaborations with developers. (Covers Q28 & Q33)
MULTIPLE_LANGUAGES_REQ: Not required. But having English or additional languages can help with international clients.
MAIN_REQUIREMENTS_JOIN: Motivation, commitment, and a desire to grow with an international network.
CONTACT_OTHER_FRANCHISEES: Yes, we can arrange introductions so you can hear real experiences.
HOW_INTERNATIONAL_SYSTEM_WORKS: Franchisees share and access listings across different countries, creating opportunities for cross-border clients.
GROW_QUICKLY_POSSIBLE: Yes. Many partners expand fast thanks to our systems, international network, and strong brand.
